summary: Nagoya University , also known as Meidai , is a university in Nagoya, Japan.
full_text: Hiroshi Amano  is a Japanese physicist and inventor specializing in the field of semiconductor technology. For his work he was awarded the 2014 Nobel Prize in Physics together with Isamu Akasaki and Shuji Nakamura for "the invention of efficient blue light-emitting diodes which has enabled bright and energy-saving white light sources".
title: Hiroshi Amano
